testimonials.label: REAL RESULTS
testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Specific feedback from the people behind the apps we've built
testimonials.testimonial_1_quote: I came to Aviniti with a concept — an app that analyzes your skin from a selfie. They turned it into a full product: 12 skin attributes, progress tracking over time, product conflict detection, personalized routines. The AI accuracy on hydration and texture analysis surprised even me. It's live and users are seeing real results.
testimonials.testimonial_2_quote: Calibre has four AI tools in one app — virtual hairstyle try-on, an AI mirror that tells you how to look your best before a meeting, a product cabinet that detects ingredient conflicts, and a Style DNA profile. Aviniti handled the computer vision, the product analysis, everything. I just described what I wanted and they figured out how to build it.
testimonials.testimonial_3_quote: We needed a system that replaces paper — attendance, incident reports, parent communication, payment tracking. Aviniti built us a dashboard, a staff app with geofencing check-in, and a parent app where families see everything about their child's day. The staff app is what convinced me — teachers use it without any training.
testimonials.testimonial_4_quote: I needed a simple tool for clinic secretaries to book appointments, manage schedules, and keep track of clients. Aviniti delivered exactly that — nothing extra, nothing missing. Works for our medical clinic and we've recommended it to a makeup artist friend who uses it too.
testimonials.testimonial_5_quote: We're a hair transplant clinic. The receptionist dashboard alone saved us hours — appointment booking, patient history, medication tracking, session context for returning clients. But the real value is the doctor's AI tool: take 4 photos of a patient's head and get follicle counts, donor area mapping, and transplant planning. We also use it to track progress at 7, 30, and 90 days post-transplant.

services.label: WHAT WE BUILD
services.title: What We Actually Build
services.subtitle: Real examples from real projects. Not generic promises.

mobile-apps.name: Mobile Apps
mobile-apps.description: Native iOS & Android apps. Real-time sync, offline-first, App Store optimized. We built SkinVerse (AI skincare), Calibre (AI grooming), and Nay Nursery (parent + staff apps) this way.
mobile-apps.technologies: Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin, Firebase, Supabase

web-applications.name: Web Applications
web-applications.description: Next.js dashboards, admin portals, and platforms. We built the Nay Nursery management dashboard, Secretary's booking system, and HairVision's clinic portal this way.
web-applications.technologies: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firebase, Vercel

ai-solutions.name: AI Integration
ai-solutions.description: Computer vision skin analysis (SkinVerse). AI hairstyle try-on and ingredient conflict detection (Calibre). Hair transplant follicle mapping and donor area analysis (HairVision). Real AI, not buzzwords.
ai-solutions.technologies: Google Gemini, OpenAI, LangChain, Superflow, TensorFlow, Python

ui-ux-design.name: UI/UX Design
ui-ux-design.description: Figma prototypes to production components. Every app we build starts with user research and ends with interfaces people actually enjoy using — like the Nay Nursery parent app that teachers adopted without training.
ui-ux-design.technologies: Figma, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Storybook, Adobe XD

why_choose.title: Why Aviniti
why_choose.subtitle: You've seen the work. Here's why 16+ clients trusted us to build it.
why_choose.reason_1_desc: We don't hand you one app and walk away. Our gym solution has 6 connected apps — owner, receptionist, trainer, shop POS, staff, and customer. Our delivery system has 3. Each piece talks to the others. You get an ecosystem built for how your business actually runs.
why_choose.reason_2_title: AI That Ships, Not AI That Slides
why_choose.reason_2_desc: SkinVerse reads 12 skin attributes from a selfie. HairVision counts follicles from a photo. AI-CDSS-DFU analyzes diabetic wounds for doctors. Sensual runs a full AI assistant locally on your phone. We build AI that works in the real world — not chatbot wrappers.
why_choose.reason_3_title: Know Your Price Before Day One
why_choose.reason_3_desc: Use our AI estimate tool — get your cost, timeline, and tech stack in 2 minutes. That number is what you pay. We've delivered 24+ products without a single scope-creep surprise. Transparent pricing isn't a promise, it's our track record.
why_choose.reason_4_desc: Right now, 15 of our clients are on active support contracts. Bug fixes, feature updates, App Store management, analytics — we're still there. 4 more projects are in active development. When we say long-term partner, we mean it.

process.title: How We Work
